name: MHTOCSMMConditionAmnioticFluidEmbolism
title: MH TOC Severe Maternal Morbidity Condition Amniotic Fluid Embolism
description: The MH TOC Severe Maternal Morbidity Condition Amniotic Fluid Embolism is derived from the MH TOC Severe Maternal Morbidity Condition Profile. This derived profile specifies an individual SMM indicator code by binding to an extension, ValueSet, and CodeSystem. There are five ICD-10 codes specified for Amniotic Fluid Embolism in this profile: O88.112, O88.113, O88.119, O88.12, O88.13
